# isCased

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether this character changes under any form of case conversion.

## Declaration

```swift
var isCased: Bool { get }
```

## Checking a Character’s Case

- **isUppercase**: A Boolean value indicating whether this character is considered uppercase.
- **uppercased()**: Returns an uppercased version of this character.
- **isLowercase**: A Boolean value indicating whether this character is considered lowercase.
- **lowercased()**: Returns a lowercased version of this character.
